author: Jeff Groom
title: Insect or Bat, Germ Warfare is a Dark Cold War Legacy
description:
Officials blame each other for the COVID-19 pandemic, but the more diabolical accusations have some basis in history.
The post Insect or Bat, Germ Warfare is a Dark Cold War Legacy appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Officials blame each other for the COVID-19 pandemic, but the more diabolical accusations have some basis in history.Before being coined COVID-19, the virus was known even to the politically correct media as the Chinese virus. Attempting to deflect blame, las… [+9568 chars]
